scripts.compile-css: VERSION="$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)";cd css && (cat pygments-solarized.css custom.css | cleancss > style-$VERSION.css) && (cat cgit.css pygments-solarized.css | cleancss > style-cgit-$VERSION.css)
scripts.postinstall: bundle install --path vendor/bundle && bower install && npm run compile-css && rm -rf _site && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.deploy-jakutis: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && tar cJvf site.tar.xz _site && scp site.tar.xz jakut.is: && rm site.tar.xz && ssh jakut.is "mv -v site 'site.$(date)' && tar xvf site.tar.xz && rm site.tar.xz && mv -v _site site && sudo bash -c 'cd /root/VARIA/jakut.is && ./install'"
scripts.deploy-firebase: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && cd _site && 7za a -t7z -m0=lzma -mx=9 -mfb=64 -md=32m -ms=on ../_site.7z . && cd .. && scp _site.7z jakut.is: && rm _site.7z && ssh jakut.is "rm -r /home/jakutis/.local/share/dotfiles/blog-generated && 7za x _site.7z -o/home/jakutis/.local/share/dotfiles/blog-generated && rm _site.7z && echo deployed"
